tool.name: Get.sabund
tool.description: Get sabund from a otu list or rabund

param.name: count
param.help: If your list file contains only the unique sequence names because you ran cluster with a count file, be sure to include the count file.

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The get.sabund_ command generates an sabund_ file from a list_ or rabund_ file.
